data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_1_0
data.value: Oh, wow! What a pretty sight!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_1_1
data.value: Wow! What an impressive sight!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_1_2
data.value: Wow! What a beautiful sight!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_2
data.value: When the weather's good, the {0} come out at sundown to blow bubbles...

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_3_0
data.value: All those bubbles, catching the setting sun's rays off the waves...

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_3_1
data.value: All those bubbles, catching the setting sun's rays off the waves...

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_3_2
data.value: All those bubbles, reflecting the setting sun off the waves...

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_4_0
data.value: It's always beautiful.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_4_1
data.value: It's always impressive.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_4_2
data.value: It's always beautiful.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_6_0
data.value: This is where I always come when I'm feeling sorry for myself.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_6_1
data.value: This is where I always end up when I'm feeling sorry for myself.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_6_2
data.value: This is where I always come when I'm feeling down on myself.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_7
data.value: But it makes me feel good to be here, like always.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_8_0
data.value: Coming here is uplifting. It cheers me up.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_8_1
data.value: Coming here cheers me up.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_8_2
data.value: Coming here heals my spirits.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_9
data.value: Hey...[pause=0]what's that?[pause=0] What's going on over there?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_10
data.value: Waah![pause=0] Someone has collapsed on the sand!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_11
data.value: What happened?![pause=0] Are you OK?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_12_0
data.value: You're awake![pause=0] That's a relief!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_12_1
data.value: Great![pause=0] You're awake!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_12_2
data.value: You're awake![pause=0] Thank goodness!

data.name: CH1_S1_Hero_3
data.value: (Where...where am I...?)

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_13_0
data.value: You weren't moving at all. I was seriously worried!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_13_1
data.value: You weren't moving. You really had me worried there!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_13_2
data.value: You wouldn't move at all. I was really scared for you!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_14_0
data.value: Do you remember how you ended up unconscious out here?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_14_1
data.value: How did you wind up unconscious out here?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_14_2
data.value: Do you have any idea how you ended up unconscious out here?

data.name: CH1_S1_Hero_4
data.value: (I... I was unconscious?[pause=0] What happened...?)

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_15_0
data.value: Well, I'm {0}.[pause=0] Glad to meet you!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_15_1
data.value: Anyway, I'm {0}.[pause=0] Glad to meet you!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_15_2

data.value: And who are you?

data.value: So who might you be?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_16_2
data.value: And who are you?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_17_0
data.value: I've never seen you around before.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_17_1
data.value: I don't think I've seen your face around here.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_17_2
data.value: I don't think I've seen you around before.

data.value: What?[pause=0] You say you're a human?

data.value: You look like a totally normal {0} to me!

data.value: Are you pulling some kind of trick on me?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_22
data.value: You're telling me the truth?

data.value: All right, then. Your name?[pause=0] What's your name?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_23_1
data.value: OK, then what's your name?[pause=0] What do you call yourself?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_23_2
data.value: OK, how about your name?[pause=0] What's your name?

data.value: Oh, {0} is your name?

data.value: So you're named {0}?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_25
data.value: OK.[pause=0] Well, you don't seem to be a bad Pokémon, at least.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_26
data.value: Sorry that I doubted you.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_27
data.value: More and more bad Pokémon have been turning up lately, you see!

data.value: Many Pokémon have gotten aggressive lately.[pause=0] Things have grown somewhat lawless...

data.value: Ouch!

data.value: Ow!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_29_2
data.value: Yowch!

data.name: CH1_S1_Koffing_1
data.value: Well, I do beg your pardon.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_30
data.value: Hey! Why'd you do that?!

data.name: CH1_S1_Zubat_1
data.value: Heh-heh-heh! Can't figure it out?

data.name: CH1_S1_Zubat_2
data.value: We wanted to mess with you! Can't face up to us, can you?!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_31
data.value: Wh-what?!

data.name: CH1_S1_Zubat_3
data.value: That's yours, isn't it?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_32_0
data.value: No! That's...!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_32_1
data.value: Hey! That's...!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_32_2
data.value: Oh! That's...!

data.name: CH1_S1_Zubat_4
data.value: Sorry, kiddo. We'll take that!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_33
data.value: Aaaah!

data.name: CH1_S1_Koffing_2
data.value: Whoa-ho-ho![pause=0] Not gonna make a move to get that back?[pause=0] What's the matter?[pause=0] Too scared?

data.name: CH1_S1_Koffing_3
data.value: I didn't expect that you'd be such a big coward!

data.name: CH1_S1_Koffing_4
data.value: Come on. Let's get out of here.

data.name: CH1_S1_Zubat_5
data.value: See you around, chicken.[pause=0] Heh-heh-heh.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_34
data.value: ...[pause=0]Ohhh...

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_35
data.value: Wh-what should I do?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_36
data.value: That's my personal treasure. It means everything to me.

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_37
data.value: If I lose that...

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_38
data.value: No! There's no time to waste!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_39_0
data.value: I've got to get it back![pause=0] Hey, can I get you to help me?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_39_1
data.value: I have to get it back![pause=0] Hey, will you help me?

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_39_2
data.value: I have to get it back![pause=0] Say, can you please help me?

data.value: R-really?[pause=0] You'll really help?!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_41A_0
data.value: Th-thank you! Let's go quickly!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_41A_1
data.value: Th-thank you! Let's go quickly!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_41A_2
data.value: Th-thanks! Can we go take care of it right now?

data.value: Awww! You won't help me?

data.value: That thing really means everything to me!

data.name: CH1_S1_Partner_41B_2
data.value: That thing is important to me!

data.value: If I can't get it back...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_1_0
data.value: Thank you! Seriously!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_1_1
data.value: Really, thank you!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_1_2
data.value: Thank you very much!

data.name: CH1_S3_Hero_2
data.value: (I only helped because I happened to be there... Was that the right thing to do?)

data.name: CH1_S3_Hero_3
data.value: (I guess so.[pause=0] This Pokémon is clearly grateful.)

data.name: CH1_S3_Hero_4
data.value: (It's nice to be appreciated.)

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_2
data.value: Here's what they stole.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_3
data.value: This is a Relic Fragment.[pause=0] ...Well, at least, that's what I started calling it...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_4
data.value: But this Relic Fragment...[pause=0] It's my precious treasure.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_5
data.value: You see, I've always liked legends and lore...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_6
data.value: I always get so excited when I hear tales from the past!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_7
data.value: Don't you feel the same way?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_8
data.value: Hidden troves full of treasure and strange relics...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_9
data.value: ...uncharted territories veiled in darkness...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_10
data.value: ...and new lands just waiting to be discovered!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_11_0
data.value: Such places must be full of unimaginable gold and treasure!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_11_1
data.value: Such places must be full of gold and treasure!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_11_2
data.value: Such places must be full of gold and treasure!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_12_0
data.value: And history! Wouldn't it be amazing to make historic discoveries?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_12_1
data.value: And history! Wouldn't it be amazing to make historic discoveries?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_12_2
data.value: And history! Wouldn't it be dramatic to make historic discoveries?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_13_0
data.value: That's what I always dream of. It's all exciting to me.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_13_1
data.value: I always dream about that. It's all exciting to me.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_13_2
data.value: That's what I always dream of. It's all so exciting to me.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_14_0
data.value: So one day...[pause=0]I happened to come across my Relic Fragment.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_14_1
data.value: So one day...[pause=0]I happened to find something... My Relic Fragment.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_14_2
data.value: And it just so happened...[pause=0]that I found this Relic Fragment.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_15_0
data.value: I admit that it looks like junk, but take a closer look.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_15_1
data.value: Sure, it looks like junk, but take a closer look...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_15_2
data.value: Sure, it does look like junk, but take a closer look.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_16_0
data.value: See?[pause=0] That inscription forms a strange pattern, doesn't it?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_16_1
data.value: See?[pause=0] See that strange pattern inscribed on it?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_16_2
data.value: Look there.[pause=0] See that strange pattern inscribed on it?

data.name: CH1_S3_Hero_5
data.value: (It's true. There is a strange inscription.)

data.name: CH1_S3_Hero_6
data.value: (I've never seen a pattern like this.)

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_17_0
data.value: There must be some significance to this pattern.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_17_1
data.value: This pattern must have some meaning to it. I'm sure of it.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_17_2
data.value: There must be some meaning to this pattern.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_18
data.value: This Relic Fragment must be the key to legendary places! To areas where precious treasure lies!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_19
data.value: At least that's the feeling I get.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_20
data.value: That's why I want to join an exploration team.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_21
data.value: This fragment must fit into something...somewhere! I want to discover where that is.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_22
data.value: I want to solve the mystery of my Relic Fragment!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_23
data.value: So earlier, I tried joining an exploration team as an apprentice...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_24_0
data.value: But...[pause=0]I chickened out.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_24_2
data.value: But...[pause=0]I was too cowardly...

data.value: What about you, {0}? What are you going to do now?

data.value: You lost your memory. And you somehow transformed into a Pokémon...

data.value: Do you have anywhere to go and stay after this?

data.value: If not, can I ask a big favor?

data.value: That's where we can get the training to become a proper exploration team.

data.value: I'm sure the training will be very tough...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_38A_1
data.value: I think the training will be really tough...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_38A_2
data.value: I think the training will be very tough...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_39A_0
data.value: But let's give it our best, {0}!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_39A_1
data.value: But let's give it our best, {0}!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_39A_2
data.value: So let's give it our best, {0}!

data.name: CH1_S3_Narration_1
data.value: And so...

data.name: CH1_S3_Narration_3
data.value: formed an exploration team.

data.name: CH1_S3_Narration_4
data.value: This turned out to be...

data.name: CH1_S3_Narration_5
data.value: their very first step into...

data.name: CH1_S3_Narration_6
data.value: many fantastic realms of adventure that awaited their arrival.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_32B_0
data.value: What?! Oh, but...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_32B_1
data.value: Huh? Oh, come on!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_32B_2
data.value: What?! Oh, please!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_33B
data.value: But I'm braver when I'm with you, {0}...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_34B_0
data.value: You were so fantastic when we confronted {0} and his sidekick.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_34B_1
data.value: And you were awesome when we beat {0} and his buddy.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_34B_2
data.value: And you were fantastic when we faced {0} and his sidekick.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_35B
data.value: When I saw that, I realized you're no ordinary Pokémon, {0}!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_36B_0
data.value: I became convinced that you'd make a first-class explorer, {0}.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_36B_1
data.value: I thought that you'd make a first-class explorer, {0}.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_36B_2
data.value: I thought that you could be a first-class explorer, {0}.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_37B_0
data.value: So come on now.[pause=0] Let's form an exploration team together.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_37B_1
data.value: So come on, I'm begging you.[pause=0] Let's form an exploration team, you and me.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_37B_2
data.value: So, please?[pause=0] Will you please form an exploration team with me?

data.name: CH1_S3_Option_3
data.value: Are you...?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_38B
data.value: Huh? [pause=0]Am I what?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_39B
data.value: What do you mean, [pause=0]"Are you...?"

data.name: CH1_S3_Option_4
data.value: You're trying to talk me into it?

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_40B
data.value: What?! [pause=0]Talk you into it?!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_41B_0
data.value: I didn't even think of it!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_41B_1
data.value: I wasn't trying to do anything!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_41B_2
data.value: The thought never crossed my mind!

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_42B
data.value: Well, I'm a complete coward...[pause=0] Honestly...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_43B
data.value: I mean, yes, I thought I could depend on you, {0}...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_44B
data.value: But during that fight with {0} earlier...

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_45B
data.value: Having you there with me, I felt really brave.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_46B
data.value: I think I could do anything as long as you're helping me, {0}.

data.name: CH1_S3_Partner_47B
data.value: So come on, I'm begging you.[pause=0] Let's form an exploration team, you and me.
